about.name: My name is
about.title: I base all my realizations on solid foundations.
about.text1: I am civil engineer and second class swimming trainer by education. So far, I have worked not only for construction company and swimming school but also tutoring. Despite my many talents, it was only programming that made me realize I wanted to pursue it on a daily basis.
about.text2: If you are looking for a person who is fully ready for action and further learning, I will be happy to join the team to gain knowledge from professionals and eagerly perform the tasks assigned to me.
